name: The Fire
description:
The Fire is a difficult 3D platformer in a world that grows around you. It takes place in a forest where you collect floating orbs and slowly piece together where you came from. As you progress through the levels the world will slowly grow around you and become much larger, turning into an open world adventure and search for your past.
ART STYLE:
The Fire features a low-poly art style that gives a relaxing and serene feel to the whole game. With miscellaneous critters and bugs that roam the world with you.
